key_risks: Intense market competition in Singapore's telecom sector
Customer service issues impacting retention and satisfaction
controversies: 2021 data breach involving personal customer information
Periodic customer complaints about service quality and support

sources.title: StarHub Mitigating Data Breach Incident, Starts Reaching Out to ...
sources.snippet: Singapore, 6 August 2021 - StarHub announced today that on 6 July 2021 during a proactive online surveillance, its cybersecurity team discovered, on a third-party data dump website, an illegally uploaded file, containing limited types of personal information related to certain individual customers. The personal data appears to be around 14 years old.

sources.title: StarHub suffers data breach, but says no system was compromised
sources.snippet: The data breach was discovered during a "proactive online surveillance" on July 6 by its cybersecurity team, StarHub said in a statement late-Friday unveiling the breach.

sources.title: Asian telecom giant StarHub suffers massive data breach; thousands of ...
sources.snippet: A recent security report notes that the confidential information of more than 57,000 StarHub customers has been leaked in what appears to be a severe oversight by the Singapore-based telecommunications company. The company's security teams discovered the data breach this weekend, when they found a file posted without the company's authorization on a download website operated by third parties.
sources.query_context: StarHub Ltd StarHub Ltd cybersecurity breaches

sources.title: Personal information of more than 57,000 StarHub customers discovered ...
sources.snippet: Singapore — A breach of personal information such as identity card numbers and mobile numbers of more than 57,000 customers was discovered by its cybersecurity team, said StarHub on Friday (Aug 6).
sources.query_context: StarHub Ltd StarHub Ltd cybersecurity breaches

sources.title: StarHub suffers data breach, but says no system was compromised
sources.snippet: StarHub says personal data of its customers, including email addresses and mobile numbers, have been found on a dump site. The Singapore telco, however, insists none of its customer database or data systems has been breached. The data breach was...
sources.query_context: StarHub Ltd StarHub Ltd cybersecurity breaches

sources.title: StarHub Suffers Breach Impacting 57,000 Customers via Leak on Third ...
sources.snippet: StarHub says personal data of its customers, including email addresses and mobile numbers, have been found on a dump site. The Singapore telco, however, insists none of its customer database or data systems have been breached. The data breach was discovered during a "proactive online surveillance" on July 6 by its cybersecurity team, StarHub said in a statement late-Friday unveiling the breach.
sources.query_context: StarHub Ltd StarHub Ltd cybersecurity breaches

sources.title: StarHub announces data breach - CIO Tech Asia
sources.snippet: StarHub has found that a third-party data dump website, an illegally uploaded file, containing limited types of personal information related to certain individual customers. The hack was discovered during a proactive online surveillance, its cybersecurity team discovered, the personal data appears to be around 14 years old.

sources.title: StarHub the latest to suffer customer data breach
sources.snippet: StarHub emphasised that "no StarHub information systems or customer database are compromised", which is probably the least bad part of the whole incident. However this would still make its customers, or customers of any telcos, nervous. As Verizon said in its 2021 Data Breach Investigations Report, 85% of all breaches involved human errors.
sources.query_context: StarHub Ltd StarHub Ltd cybersecurity breaches

queries.rationale: Investigate potential legal or regulatory challenges related to telecom regulations and spectrum licensing in Singapore
Explore customer feedback and complaints regarding service quality and support to assess reputational risks
Examine any reported cybersecurity incidents or vulnerabilities in StarHub's enterprise solutions to evaluate risks to client data and infrastructure
